mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the lands, granted to the Cherokee Indians, by the state of North Carolina, under the Act of 1783: to accompany Doct. House of Reprs. No. 185, 1st session 29th Contress / lith. by E. Weber & Co. Baltimore
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 16 x 25 cm. on sheet 23 x 30 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Detached from: Cherokee disturbances : Message from the President of the United States, relative to the Cherokee difficulties, April 13, 1846.
Map shows "Part of Tennessee" and "pt. of North Carolina."
"Division line in 1809 between the upper and lower towns."
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: House document (United States. Congress. House) 29th Congress, 1st session, no. 185
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cherokee Indians--Land tenure--North Carolina--Maps

Tennessee--Maps
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
